purpleculture_pinyin:
lán
to block sb's path; to obstruct; to flag down (a taxi)
заблокировать путь sb; препятствовать; остановить (такси)
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 拦)
Pictophonetic: 闌 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
攔截 [ lán jié ]: to intercept
攔阻 [ lán zǔ ]: to block; to obstruct
攔網 [ lán wǎng ]: to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc); to block
攔腰 [ lán yāo ]: (hitting) squarely in the middle; (slicing) across the middle; to hold by the waist
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 闌 [ lán ] screen door, railing, fence
heisig_chinese_memo: You can't try to impede a gargoyle with just your fingers. You'll need to use your brain for this one.
Ru_trainchinese: lán: (глаг) препятствовать, удерживать, блокировать; быть направленным прямо на
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If anything impedes your concentration, just wrap your fingers around the stem of your orchid and take a slow whif to relax.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand ", " Lan " sound. " Bar " is " exhausted " newcomer differentiation word indicates the stop, stop. "Jade articles. "Hand": "Block, block." For example, Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Bing Chaxing": "Cry with clothes and feet to stop and cry, crying straight up to the sky." Southern Song Ge Changgeng "Liu Shaoqing": "Liu Xue Yingqi, the east wind stops the horse, the elders fight to see."

" Lan " can be used as a preposition to mean " dang " or "opposite." For example, Chapter 29 of "Journey to the West": "Look at him leaping forward, clenching his steel teeth; dripping, opening his eyes; correcting, raising his knife; red showering, and slashing at the stop." "The Romance of" Chapter 27: "Wang Zhi shoots a horse and shoots a spear, and heads to Guan Gong; he is cut in two by Guan Gong."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand ", the sound of " Lan ". " Bar " is " exhausted " newcomer differentiation word indicates the stop, stop.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「闌」聲。「攔」是「闌」的後起分化字，表示阻攔、阻擋。《玉篇．手部》：「攔，摭攔也。」如唐代杜甫〈兵車行〉：「牽衣頓足攔道哭，哭聲直上干雲霄。」南宋葛長庚〈柳梢青〉：「柳雪縈旗，東風攔馬，父老爭看。」

　　「攔」可作介詞，表示「當」、「對著」。如《西遊記》第29回：「你看他屹迸迸，咬響鋼牙；滴溜溜，睜圓環眼；雄糾糾，舉起刀來；赤淋淋，攔頭便砍。」《三國演義》第27回：「王植拍馬挺鎗，逕奔關公；被關公攔腰一刀，砍為兩段。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「闌」聲。「攔」是「闌」的後起分化字，表示阻攔、阻擋。

攔 (Simplified: 拦)
Pinyin: lán
English Definition: to block sb's path; to obstruct; to flag down (a taxi)
Total strokes: 20; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 闌 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 闌 [ lán ] screen door, railing, fence
Example Words:
攔截 [ lán jié ]: to intercept
攔阻 [ lán zǔ ]: to block; to obstruct
攔網 [ lán wǎng ]: to intercept at the net (volleyball, tennis etc); to block
攔腰 [ lán yāo ]: (hitting) squarely in the middle; (slicing) across the middle; to hold by the waist
More: 攔* | *攔 | *攔*

從「 手 」，「 闌 」聲。「 攔 」是「 闌 」的後起分化字，表示阻攔、阻擋。《玉篇．手部》：「攔，摭攔也。」如唐代杜甫〈兵車行〉：「牽衣頓足攔道哭，哭聲直上干雲霄。」南宋葛長庚〈柳梢青〉：「柳雪縈旗，東風攔馬，父老爭看。」 「 攔 」可作介詞，表示「 當 」、「對著」。如《西遊記》第29回：「你看他屹迸迸，咬響鋼牙；滴溜溜，睜圓環眼；雄糾糾，舉起刀來；赤淋淋，攔頭便砍。」《三國演義》第27回：「王植拍馬挺鎗，逕奔關公；被關公攔腰一刀，砍為兩段。」

For example, Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Bing Chaxing": "Cry with clothes and feet to stop and cry, crying straight up to the sky." Southern Song Ge Changgeng "Liu Shaoqing": "Liu Xue Yingqi, the east wind stops the horse, the elders fight to see." " Lan" can be used as a preposition to mean " dang" or "opposite." For example, Chapter 29 of "Journey to the West": "Look at him leaping forward, clenching his steel teeth; dripping, opening his eyes; correcting, raising his knife; red showering, and slashing at the stop." "The Romance of" Chapter 27: "Wang Zhi shoots a horse and shoots a spear, and heads to Guan Gong; he is cut in two by Guan Gong."

攔字的基本解释

攔
lán
见“拦”。

攔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lán］
［《廣韻》落干切，平寒，來。］
“拦1”的繁体字。
(1)遮拦，阻拦。
(2)当，正对。
(3)挡住其它方向，沿着一条路线驱赶牛羊等。引申指放牧。
(4)通“欄”。栏干；拦圈。

攔字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　攔； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页462第48
【玉篇】力丹切【唐韻】落千切，?音蘭。遮攔也。亦作闌。

攔字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
攔字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［lán］
["Guangyun" is dry and cut, Ping Han, come. ]
The traditional characters of "block1".
(1) Block, block.
(2) When, right.
(3) Block other directions and drive cattle and sheep along a route. The extension refers to grazing.
(4) Link the "column". Fence dry; block circle.
